title: SERVICES
cleaned_text: SERVICES The Center for Chinese Medicine offers the services of Acupuncture, Chinese Herbal supplements, including individualized herbology, nutritional counseling and supplements, and moxibustion to effectively alleviate many physical and mental issues, including: Diseases: Arthritis Asthma Cancers Diabetes Gastrointestinal Immune System Endocrine/Thyroid Virus Hepatitis C, Hepatitis B Herpes simplex and Herpes Zoster HPV and varied virus infection. Influenza virus Female & Male Conditions Irregular menstruation Menopause Fertility/Infertility Prostate Pain Relief & Management Neck or Back Pain Sciatica TMJ Other Conditions Acne Allergies Anxiety/Depression Chronic fatigue syndrome Fatigue Fibromyalgia Lupus Tinnitus Weight Control
